rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment does not contain a question.
Reports editorial action; lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes an editorial action, not capability or preparedness related to the disease.
The segment describes an update to an article, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment describes an update to the article, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quote or attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
